title: Ellen Johnson Sirleaf | Academy of Achievement

organizations.name: Association of Female Lawyers
quotes: Even before my administration started, the Association of Female Lawyers — given that incidences of rape are so high in our country — had already got legislation passed.

organizations.name: United Nations
quotes: It was already a criminal offense, but now it’s a crime against humanity, as recognized by the United Nations.
